post.text:
Trump says, "I know more about ISIS than the generals do, believe me."

You know what? We don't.

comment.author: Samantha
comment.text: Trump would'nt have to know much, to know more than Obama and Hillary does, Obama did not agree with the Generals, so he by-passed the Generals, and called on outsider's on what to do, (it's all in a documentary) that's why things are so bad, he didn't listen, because Obama thought he was smarter, it's not the "jv" team no more...#HILLNO..

replies.author: William
replies.text: Samantha What Trump knows would fill a sock! And he proves it every single time he opens his stupid mouth!!

replies.author: Samantha
replies.text: William , can't handle the truth, huh? You have no argument, facts don't lie like Hillary does..I agree Trump is not a politican, and he says some off the wall things, but, he is not a 30 year documented corrupt liar...#NEVERHER..

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: It was messed up when Obama got there

replies.author: Lauren
replies.text: What a bunch of idiots. Trump? Good for America? Really? I despair what he'll do to this country. Bush was all about himself too, thought he knew everything. Look what happened! You almost destroyed the entire world by throwing in to a financial down spin.

replies.author: Kayleigh
replies.text: Samantha he is a pathological liar or have you not been paying attention to the facts?
